text: Valerie Elise Plame Wilson, known simply as Valerie Plame, is a former officer of the Central Intelligence Agency, politician and the author of two books related to her career. Her identity was revealed to public on July 14, 2003; that ended Plame's career with the CIA, from which she resigned around December 2005. In May 2019, Plame announced her plans to run for the United States House of Representatives for New Mexico's 3rd congressional district. She lost the primary for the Democratic nomination on June 3, 2020. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:American political writers Category:CIA people Category:Politicians from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Politicians from New Mexico Category:Writers from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Writers from New Mexico
title: Valerie Plame
